button.name: Delete

button.script: _local.passOut += '0'; return _local.checkPass();

button.name: Clear
button.script: _local.passOut = ''; _local.checkPass();

<script src="http://localhost/html/colorpickerpro/jquery-3.3.1.slim.min.js"></script>

        (function ($) {
            'use strict';

            $(document).ready(function() {

		alert("here");
                var colorPickerMultiSpectralCustomAnchor = new ColorPicker.MultiSpectral('#dc-ex2', {
                    color: 'green'
                });
        })(jQuery);
    </script>
